property.name: eventCalendarCommandString
property.value: SELECT i.item_id, i.pubDate, i.title, id.description, i.all_day_event, i.endDate FROM item i INNER JOIN item_description id on i.item_id = id.item_id WHERE i.pubDate BETWEEN @startDate AND @endDate AND (i.channel_id = @channelIdSpecial OR i.channel_id = @channelIdRegular) AND (ACTIVE = 1 OR ACTIVE IS NULL)

property.name: eventCalendarDatesCommandString
property.value: SELECT i.item_id, i.pubDate, i.title FROM item i WHERE i.pubDate BETWEEN @startDate AND @endDate AND i.channel_id = @channelIdSpecial OR i.channel_id = @channelIdRegular AND (ACTIVE = 1 OR ACTIVE IS NULL)

property.name: eventFindDetailsPkSql
property.value: SELECT i.item_id, i.pubDate, i.title, i.all_day_event allDayEvent, i.channel_id channelId, i.author, id.description FROM item AS i INNER JOIN item_description AS id ON i.item_id = id.item_id WHERE i.item_id = @itemId
